theori to formal languag specif is demonstr and other applic
ar survei the first languag consid loop is veri elementari
and it definit mere introduc the notat and methodolog of
the approach then the semant concept of environ store and
continu ar introduc to model class of program languag featur
and the underli mathemat theori of comput due to scott
is motiv and outlin final the paper present a formal
definit of the languag gedanken cacm august 1976 tennent r

of comput higher order function recurs definit loop gedanken 4
